scripts.check-changelog: expr $(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null| grep "^\s*[AM].*packages/interface/CHANGELOG.md" | wc -l) >/dev/null || (echo 'Please edit CHANGELOG.md' && exit 1)
scripts.check-only-changelog-changed: (expr $(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null| grep -v "CHANGELOG.md" | wc -l) >/dev/null && echo 'Only CHANGELOG.md may have uncommitted changes' && exit 1) || exit 0
scripts.postversion: git commit package.json CHANGELOG.md -m "[interface] Version $npm_package_version" && npm run tag && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.prepublish: in-publish && safe-publish-latest && npm run build || not-in-publish
scripts.preversion: npm test && npm run check-changelog && npm run check-only-changelog-changed
